${ModID}:ApplyPoison.NAME: Apply Poison
${ModID}:ApplyPoison.DESCRIPTION: Enter ${ModID}:Venemous. If you are in ${ModID}:Venemous at the start of your next turn, exit ${ModID}:Venemous.

${ModID}:Guile.NAME: Guile
${ModID}:Guile.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard 2 cards. NL Enter ${ModID}:Cunning.
